content.question: Taken as a whole, the reasoning and evidence in the passage primarily defend a claim regarding

choices.label: the origin of stereotypes applied to video gamers
a theory explaining the appeal of video gaming
a beneficial aspect of video gaming
the influence of parents and educators on video gamers

content.answer: a beneficial aspect of video gaming
